admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Technical Assistance Project will
            help Mongolia develop its institutional capacity for
            macroeconomic management in a market economy. It will also
            help define strategies for sectors/subsectors key to
            Mongolia's economic development and, as appropriate,
            demonstrate or confirm the feasibility of selected public
            investments. The project has two components. The first, a
            program of advisory assistance, in-country and overseas
            training, and material support will concentrate on
            developing Mongolia's institutional capacity for
            macroeconomic management and reform. Assistance will be
            directed at the institutions with key roles to play in the
            transition. The second component will finance strategic
            studies in selected sectors/subsectors key to the long-term
            development of Mongolia's economy, and feasibility
            studies of key projects identified in light of these sector strategies.
